attributes.action: 10 year Minimum prison sentence for sexual offences against children
attributes.additional_details: Every paper there is a new disgusting case and we are not doing enough to protect these innocent children! They need people to help them! Child abuse can effect a person for the rest of their Life! It can ruin a persons whole world for as long as they live and why should a person be given a petty sentence for destroying someone’s whole world! I feel this is one of the most horrendous crimes around and yet some cases get a lesser sentence than theft and drug crimes. HELP these children!
attributes.background: We need to stop these terrible things happening over and over. Once someone is know as any form of danger to a child it needs to be stopped there! More children are put at unnecessary danger and ruining lives before they have barely begun.
